system.description:
Benefits

Characters wielding a firearm threaten adjacent squares and can use their firearm to make attacks of opportunity. These attacks are Potshots and take the normal penalty for Potshot attacks. This attack does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity. Also, when performing a potshot attack with any weapon without a stock, or with an integral, folding, or fixed folding stock in the folded position within 30 feet, the Combat Point cost is 1 less.
